gold.user: Retrieve the details of a specific group by its ID.
Create a new group with the specified name and description.
gold.ideal: Group is successfully created and returned with its ID.

gold.user: Remove an existing group by its ID.
Retrieve details of multiple groups in a single request.
gold.ideal: Successful retrieval of all specified groups.

gold.user: Get a list of users belonging to a specific group.
gold.ideal: Successful retrieval of users in the group.

gold.user: Add a user to a specified group by user ID.
gold.ideal: User is successfully added to the group.

gold.user: Remove a user from a specified group by user ID.
gold.ideal: User is successfully removed from the group.

gold.user: Search for groups based on a query string.
gold.ideal: Successful retrieval of groups matching the query.
